original_text: therefore, behold, I have stretched out my hand against you, and will hand you over as plunder to the nations. And I will cut you off from the peoples and will make you perish out of the countries; I will destroy you. Then you will know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 손을 네 위에 펴서 너를 다른 민족에게 넘겨 주어 노략을 당하게 하며 너를 만민 중에서 끊어 버리며 너를 여러 나라 가운데에서 패망하게 하여 멸하리니 내가 주 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: I have stretched out my hand against you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 손을 너에게 향하여 펼쳤고,

sentences.original_text: and will hand you over as plunder to the nations.
And I will cut you off from the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여러 민족 가운데서 너를 끊어버리며,

sentences.original_text: and will make you perish out of the countries;
